customer_reviews.title: Drying and thick constiency
customer_reviews.text: Its thick for applying to scalp/hair and has like a gel feel. It foamed up easily ,but felt as drying as any other strong sulfate shampoo. It dried out my coily hair. The smell is like a light perfume scent. Its probably ideal for those wanting a deep clarifying cleanse but not good for a moisturizing and daily/weekly cleansing unless there is lot of product bulid-up/grease/dirt oil. It probably okay for wavy/straight/curly hair that is not prone to dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo, but I don't recommend to use it exclusively
customer_reviews.text: I used this shampoo exclusively for over 6 months and began experiencing excessive hair loss/shedding. My scalp became OVERLY dry with lots of big, clumpy dandruff flakes all over. I started to panic. After doing research, I found that I should be using a clarifying shampoo regularly to ensure my scalp gets totally clean. So, I started using a new shampoo and my scalp is back to being clean and dandruff free. I really like this shampoo because it's very slippery and conditioning for my tangled curly mane. However, I recommend using a clarifying shampoo at least once or twice a month to ensure your scalp is getting thoroughly cleaned.

product_meta.title: OGX Hydrate and Repair + Argan Oil of Morocco Extra Strength Shampoo, 13 Fluid Ounce Bottle, for Damaged Hair
product_meta.description: Cleanse your hair and give it strength, softness, and shine with the OGX Renewing Plus Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo. This restorative shampoo is infused with Moroccan argan oil to help nourish hair with a thick, creamy formula that also helps detangle. This shampoo helps repair damaged strands, restores strength, and penetrates the hair shaft for silky-soft perfection with ultra moisture. With a lightweight and sulfate-free formula, this refreshing conditioner is a great haircare product for fine hair, straight hair, curly hair, thick hair, coarse hair and damaged hair. Keep moisture locked in and further help restore hair with OGX Renewing Argan Oil of Morocco Conditioner.
feature_bullets: MORROCAN HAIR SECRET: Repair dry, damaged, brittle tresses with this extra powerful blend infused with argan oil of Morocco. Intensely hydrate, while this blend infused with silk proteins lock in moisture to give hair the look & feel of silky perfection.

SOFT, SEDUCTIVE, SILKY: This rich blend infused with argan oil of Morocco + silk proteins help repair even the most severely dry, damaged strands, drenching them w/ hydration & helping to strengthen your strands. Discover the Morrocan magic of argan oil.

BEAUTY PURE AND SIMPLE: OGX hair care products are inspired by nature. We don’t try to make hair look “perfect” because we’d rather make hair look fuller, smoother, straighter, curlier, or bouncier & smell irresistible while we’re at it.

ROCK WHAT YOU'VE GOT: OGX hair care products are designed to bring out the best in your hair, no matter what type or texture. Whether you need quenching moisture for curly hair, protection for colored hair, blowout cream, or matte pomade--we've got you.

YOUR ORIGINALITY INSPIRES US; at OGX we don't try to make your hair look perfect because it is. We'd rather make it look fuller, smoother, straighter, curlier or bouncier and smell irresistible too, so you love it even more
